artist: Delineator: R. B. Belau; Engraver: Gerore-Daniel Heumann; Publisher: Johann Andréas Pfeffel
description: Archbishop seated at center drawing of church being held by angel and cherubs at right; books and globe on floor; at left two women one holding cross behind, man on floor in front of large cross; hand with chalice extended behind cross; three cherubs to left of cross; in a rectangular frame with pedestals at each side and plaque with inscription below
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black: [ eight lines of Latin \"Celsissimo et Reverendissima.....Domino, Domino Clementissimo\"/ R.B. Belau delin. Viennae   I.A. Pfeffel S.C.M. Calchogr. excud. A.V.    G.D.Heüman sculps.]; on sheet and verso in pencil: [1-535]
title: Celsissimo et Reverendissimo Principi ac Domino
